landing.heroSubtitle: A fun, gamified task management system designed to help kids build positive habits, one quest at a time.
landing.featuresTitle: Why Kids and Parents Love Habit Heroes

feature1.title: Engaging Quests
feature1.description: Daily tasks are transformed into exciting quests, making chores and homework feel like a game.

feature2.title: Unlock Achievements
feature2.description: Kids earn badges and trophies for completing tasks and maintaining streaks, boosting motivation.

feature3.title: Grow a Virtual Pet
feature3.description: Completing quests helps a cute virtual pet grow and evolve, creating a bond and a reason to stay engaged.

feature4.title: Parental Controls
feature4.description: Easily set up tasks, monitor progress, and create custom rewards for your little heroes.
